artefact.alternative_title: Find driving schools, lessons and driving instructors
artefact.overview: Find driving lessons with your nearest driving instructors who are approved and registered with the Driving Standards Agency (DSA)
artefact.more_information: ^ Not all approved driving instructors in your area will be listed. ^
artefact.introduction:
Find your nearest driving instructors who are approved and registered with the Driving Standards Agency.

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency

artefact.title: Driving tests and learning to drive

details.description: Includes booking a test, changing and cancelling tests, rules and fees

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.

artefact.title: Driving before you've got your full licence
Apply for your first provisional driving licence
